name: cravenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely cowardly (= not brave) way: I cravenly agreed, simply in order not to antagonize him. He wrote to her afterwards, hoping cravenly that she had not been hurt.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are cravenly giving in to their threats by censoring our own media.They cravenly submitted to the pressure to sack her.I lay down on the floor in front of them and cravenly begged forgiveness.The directors were denounced for failing so cravenly to defend artists' rights.
